channel.title: Adding New Shops?
channel.description: Can some1 tell me where I add the code for MORE shops and give an example code for me to look back on, I catch on very quickly. Please. Thank you.

item.title: Adding New Shops?
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

the regular code that everybody has been posting in tutorials doesn’t work on my server. I think I’m using pvpscape if anyone could help[br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2007, 08:28:23 PM[/size][hr][quote=“pbrain30, post:2, topic:56303”]open shops.cfg and go to bottom just befor [END OF thing add your shop and wat it sells

eg of my ultimate shop:

shop = 46 @red@Ultimate_Pure_Shop 1 2 893 10000 2581 1000 2577 1000 1129 1000 6568 1000 6109 1000 6107 1000 6108 1000 6106 1000 6110 1000 6111 1000 4587 1000 7400 1000 7398 1000 7399 1000 4675 1000 3751 1000 3753 1000 3749 1000 2 2 6522 10 6523 10 6524 10 6525 10 6526 10 6527 10 6528 10 6568 10 6570 10
[ENDOFSHOPLIST][/quote]

Thats the thing, I add the shop and have the npc and everything but when I trade the dude, it lags me out.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding New Shops?
